trustfund:
TF030463-IRISH CTF FY04 - SUB-SAHARAN AFRICA,TF054328-MOZAMBIQUE : HIV/AIDS - C. FORKIN,TFM54328-MOZAMBIQUE : SUPPORT TO
            HIV/AIDS PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The changes to the HIV/AIDS response
            project for Mozambique are as follows: (i) modify the
            project development objective (PDO) to indicate that the IDA
            is only one player in the fight against HIV/AIDS and that
            its success will be judged through the success of key
            prevention and care activities. Thus the PDO will read as
            follows: The Project Development Objective is to contribute
            to slow the spread of HIV/AIDS in Mozambique and mitigate
            the effects of the epidemic through prevention and care
            activities; (ii) change the results framework indicators by
            removing one outcome indicator, which makes a specific
            reference to prevalence rate, and adding one outcome
            indicator and modifying three intermediate outcome
            indicators that can be attributed to the project; (iii)
            change the funding mechanism in order to allow IDA funds for
            Parts A, B, C and E of the Project to be channeled to the
            Common Fund of the National Commission to Combat AIDS (CNCS)
            together with funds from other bilateral and multilateral
            organizations; (iv) reallocate funds between categories; and
            (v) extend the closing date of the project.
